bullet_points: Engineered psychological profiles by analyzing conversational data with NLP, embeddings, and multi-domain semantic pipelines
Built ontology-driven classification with 40k+ facets across psychology, spirituality, and behavior, enhancing profile accuracy
Designed Neo4j graph database structure to store embeddings and enable similarity search for real-time seeker-facilitator matching
Delivered scalable data profiling pipeline integrating Python, Flask, and rating systems for adaptive user insights

education.institution: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar College, Deekshabhoomi Nagpur

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis on Healthcare Apps
bullet_points: Conducted large-scale sentiment analysis of 3L+ users across 5 healthcare apps using NLP preprocessing and feature engineering
Built topic models with Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) and extracted semantic features using TF-IDF for clustering user concerns
Applied TextBlob and Vader sentiment models to analyze polarity trends, identifying satisfaction levels with actionable insights
Visualized sentiment distributions using scatter plots, heatmaps, and bar charts for academic research impact

projects.name: Stock Price Forecasting with GAN and Twitter Sentiment Analysis
bullet_points: Utilized NLTK Vader sentiment analysis to process large-scale Twitter datasets on Amazon stock in real-time
Integrated sentiment signals with historical stock data using technical indicators (ESMA, MA, MACD, Bollinger Bands)
Deployed advanced Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for stock price forecasting with 3.8% MAPE robustness
Built end-to-end pipeline combining NLP, deep learning, and sentiment signals to capture market financial movements

projects.name: Food Demand Forecasting Using Time Series Models
bullet_points: Analyzed large-scale meal demand data from Weeks 1–145 using statistical EDA with ACF and PACF to detect autocorrelation patterns
Implemented ARIMA-X, SARIMA-X, and exponential smoothing models for multi-seasonal demand forecasting with trend adjustments
Evaluated forecasting accuracy with MAPE of 4.5% and SMAPE of 6.02% on test datasets
Delivered reproducible forecasting pipeline in Python with structured preprocessing, automated training, and better visualization

projects.name: Disease Prediction Using Drug Review Dataset
bullet_points: Processed 50k+ drug reviews mapped to medical conditions, applying lemmatization, stopword removal, and TF-IDF feature extraction
Built supervised ML models with Multinomial Naive Bayes and Passive Aggressive Classifier for robust classification
Optimized predictive models using detailed n-gram analysis and extensive hyperparameter tuning, achieving 98.3% peak accuracy
Created scalable ML workflow in Python with Langgraph, ensuring reproducibility and high interpretability with feature matrix analysis

competitions.name: Band Gap Prediction in Perovskite Oxides
achievements: Achieved 2nd position by classifying complex perovskite oxides as insulators vs non-insulators using Random Forest and XGBoost
Designed advanced regression models to predict band gap values with engineered descriptors and optimized Gradient Boosting
Performed detailed feature importance analysis and SHAP analysis to identify critical predictive features
Built scalable ML pipeline in Python with structured preprocessing, automated training, visualization, and reporting workflows

Applied machine learning models to predict difficulty adjustments, ensuring adaptive gameplay and enhanced player satisfaction
Visualized game performance with Python and Tableau, providing actionable insights for design iterations and feature updates
